Title: Faithful
Writer: Margaret Atwood (based on the novel by), Nina Fiore (executive story editor), Dorothy Fortenberry (teleplay by), John Hererra (executive story editor), Bruce Miller (created by)
Actors: Elisabeth Moss, Joseph Fiennes, Yvonne Strahovski, Alexis Bledel
Plot: Serena Joy makes Offred a surprising proposition; Offred remembers the unconventional beginning of her relationship with Luke; Ofglen, now Ofsteven, tries reintegrating into Gilead.
